days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O God, who among the many marvels of Your grace in the New World, did cause to blossom on the banks of the Mohawk and Saint Lawrence rivers, the pure and tender Lily, Kateri Tekakwitha, grant we beseech Thee, the favor we beg through her intercession (here make your request), that this  young lover of Jesus and of His Cross, will enkindle in our hearts a stronger desire to imitate her innocence and faith. Through the same Christ Our Lord.Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our FatherHail MaryGlory Be
